short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract and select the text from images, adjust the image colors, modify the image appearance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhanced Image allows you to extract and select the image text; modify the colors of the image; transform the image topology; and in the future will grant you more possibilities to enhance the way you view images.

Enhanced Image is powered by Open-Sourced Custom HTML Elements (github.com/plurid/enhanced-image) and plurid's depict service (plurid.com/depict).

The color modifications and image topology transformations are open to be used freely.

For image text extraction you need a plurid' account (account.plurid.com) which grants you 10 free image text extractions each month, or you can buy more.
